job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly addresses understanding customer needs and translating them into technical solutions, which is the core of business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to connect technology work with overarching business objectives.
This term implies a focus on business strategy and how technology supports it.
While not strictly 'development', evolving applications, especially in a platform like Salesforce, involves configuration and implementation which aligns with building software solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Apply AI tools and techniques to automate repetitive tasks, improve configuration speed, and enhance project delivery
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the application of AI techniques, though it's focused on automation and efficiency rather than core model building.
This directly relates to building and deploying technological solutions for customers.

job_tasks.phrase: Work directly with customers to gather and understand business requirements, translating them into effective CPQ configurations
job_tasks.justification: The act of configuring CPQ solutions based on requirements is a form of implementing a technological solution.

job_tasks.phrase: Handle end-to-end configuration of the CPQ system, ensuring alignment with customer requirements while adhering to best practices
job_tasks.justification: End-to-end configuration of a system is a software development/implementation task.
While focused on automation, this implies the application of AI to improve processes, touching on the modeling aspect of AI.

soft_skills.phrase: practical, adaptable problem-solver with a hands-on approach
constantly learning, especially in the realm of AI and CPQ

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on business requirements, customer interaction, and configuring existing platforms like Salesforce CPQ. While it mentions applying AI tools for automation and efficiency, it lacks the core responsibilities of building, fine-tuning, or deeply understanding generative models, which are central to a GenAI Engineer role.
